00153 int CdSocket::receiveBuffer(void* buffer, int buffer_size)

00155   ret_status=0;
00156   for(int nbytes=0;nbytes<buffer_size;)
00157     {
00158       /*** to be sure tha everything is received ***/

00164           break;
